item.title: Italy
item.description:
Brief Summary

A wonderful trip through the beautiful cities of Verona, Venice, Florence, Siena, and Bologna, focused on culture, history, and food. The itinerary includes iconic landmarks, local markets, and authentic Italian experiences.

Itinerary Overview

  • 25–28 June: Verona
    • Juliet’s House & Balcony
    • Verona Arena & La Traviata, the most performed opera in the world
    • Piazza delle Erbe
    • Castelvecchio & Bridge
  • 28 June – 01 July: Venice
    • St. Mark’s Basilica & Square
    • Grand Canal & Vaporetto ride
    • Doge’s Palace
    • Islands visits
  • 01–05 July: Florence
    • Florence Cathedral (Duomo) & Giotto’s Campanile
    • David statue
    • Ponte Vecchio
  • 05–10 July: Siena
    • Piazza del Campo (Palio di Siena location)
    • Siena Cathedral (Duomo di Siena)
    • Torre del Mangia
    • Tuscan countryside day trips
  • 10–13 July: Bologna
    • Piazza Maggiore & Basilica di San Petronio
    • Asinelli and Garisenda Towers
    • Traditional Bolognese cuisine (tagliatelle al ragù)
    • Archiginnasio of Bologna (historic university library)

Photos

Back to top

item.title: Kona & Hilo
item.description:
Brief Summary

A wonderful vacation, relaxing and exciting. In the Pacific, relaxation was easy. And seeing wildlife, it was quite exciting: manta rays, dolphins, turtles, and wild goats roaming the lava fields. The black pepper plant and cocoa juice, made from cocoa seed pulp, were unforgettable.

Miscellaneous Notes

  • Travel dates: 2024-11-18 — 2024-11-28
  • 5 days in Kona, the sunny side.
  • 5 days in Hilo, the rainy side.

Photos

Back to top

item.title: Canadian Rockies
item.description:
Brief Summary

A short road trip to the Canadian Rockies which includes a visit to the town of Banff, a ride along the Icefields Parkway, and a stop at Lake Louise is a perfect way to experience the stunning natural beauty of this region. Many memorable sights, from the turquoise waters of Lake Louise to the towering peaks of the surrounding mountains. We also visited Barkerville, a historic mining town in British Columbia, which provided a fascinating glimpse into the Gold Rush era.

Miscellaneous Notes

  • Travel dates: 2023-06-26 - 2023-07-06

  • Transportation: 2012 Electra & 2018 Suzili

Photos
